data.prayer: Father, encourage the 0 believers in Oslomej to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oslomej, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Oslomej. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Oslomej, North Macedonia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 0 believers in Oslomej, North Macedonia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Albanian, Macedonian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Oslomej to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: the state of Oslomej has (about) 0 people who know Jesus, 62 people who know about him culturally, and 38 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Oslomej, North Macedonia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
